title: Need help with this sans-serif
content:
Hello everyone,

I'm looking to identify the font below:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819191151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sansserif_4235.png)

Does anyone know what font this is?

Thanks in advance to anyone who replies!
author: omgdude

comments.content: Hard to say, very small, could be a lot of thing including a free font. That'd probably easier with the sample origin (a website I guess). Whatever it is, it's close to [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819191151/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/avenir).

Hey Ryuk,

That is exactly right, thanks!
